title: Savarin with Chantilly cream
description: Not just another teatime sponge, this citrus-flavoured yeasted cake is soaked in orange liqueur syrup and crowned with Chantilly cream and fresh fruit. For when you want to go all out. For this recipe you will need a 23cm/9in bundt tin or savarin mould, a sugar thermometer and a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle.
ingredients: 180g/6oz unsalted butter, at room temperature, cubed, plus extra for greasing
1 large orange, finely grated zest and segmented fruit
1 large unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest only
100ml/3½fl oz orange liqueur, preferably Grand Marnier
100g/3½oz plain chocolate (70% cocoa solids), finely chopped
sliced mixed fruit (such as orange, mango, kiwi, strawberries)
